name: vscode-julia-formatter
description: A formatter for the Julia language

juliaFormatter.margin.markdownDescription: The maximum number of characters of code on a single line. Lines over the limit will be wrapped if possible. There are cases where lines cannot be wrapped and they will still end up wider than the requested margin.

juliaFormatter.alwaysForIn.description: Always replaces `=` with `in` for `for` loops. For example, `for i = 1:10` will be transformed to `for i in 1:10`.

juliaFormatter.indent.description: The number of spaces used for an indentation.

juliaFormatter.overwrite.description: Writes the formatted source to a new file where the original filename is suffixed with _fmt, i.e. `filename_fmt.jl`.
